tool_description: This is an API which extracts news/article body from a URL and uses GPT to summarize (and optionally translate) the article content. Useful for text mining purposes. Leverages powerful and flexible web scraping engine (ScrapeNinja.net) with high-quality rotating proxies under the hood. In depth review and API implementation details: https://pixeljets.com/blog/gpt-summary-is-broken/ . My video where ChatGPT summary capabilities are explored: https://youtu.be/hRQqJtgYz_Q
title: Article Extractor and Summarizer

api_list.name: /summarize
api_list.description: Summarizes the article after extracting it from the specified url.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Target language to translate summary into

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: pass TRUE if you want to convert new line symbols in API response text with html paragraph tags

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length in paragraphs. This parameter might be ignored for a very long articles.

api_list.name: /extract
api_list.description: Extract an article body and markdown version of the body.

utterances.utterance: Can you get the full text of the article from https://nytimes.com/2024/04/25/technology/ai-ethics.html?
Please extract the main content from this link: https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-65512345.
I need the article body in markdown format from https://www.cnn.com/2024/06/10/science/new-discovery/index.html.
Could you pull the full article text from https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2024/jun/15/climate-change-report?
Extract the complete article content from https://techcrunch.com/2024/05/20/startup-funding-trends.
Get me the body text of the news article at https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/oil-prices-rise-2024-06-12/
Please provide the extracted article content from https://www.nationalgeographic.com/science/article/space-exploration-2024-missions.
I want the full markdown article from https://www.wsj.com/articles/market-trends-2024-06-14.
Could you extract the article text from https://www.forbes.com/sites/2024/06/13/innovation-in-ai-startups/
Retrieve the article body from https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2024/06/11/new-vaccine-research.

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide a concise summary of the article from this URL?
Please extract the main points from the news story at this link and summarize them.
I'd like a brief overview of the content found at the given webpage.
Summarize the article text from the URL I provide in Markdown format.
Could you pull the key information from the article on this site and give me a summary?
Give me a short summary of the news article located at the specified web address.
Extract and condense the main ideas from the article found at the URL.
I want a summarized version of the text content from the webpage I share.
Please scrape the article from the link and provide a markdown summary.
Can you generate a brief summary of the news content available at the given URL?

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide a concise summary of the article from this URL?
Please extract the main points from the news story at this link and summarize them in Markdown format.
I'd like a brief overview of the content found at the given webpage.
Summarize the key information from the article located at the specified URL.
Could you generate a Markdown summary of the text from the provided news link?
Give me a short and clear summary of the article content from this web address.
Extract and condense the main ideas from the article found at the URL into a Markdown summary.
Please provide a summarized version of the news article available at the given link.
I need a brief Markdown summary of the text content from the specified webpage.
Can you pull the article text from the URL and create a concise summary in Markdown?
